entry.title: RT Michelle Bakels: G2i is hiring remote: - Core Team React Engineers - Senior Growth Manager - Director of Growth Marketing - Community Manager There...
entry.summary: RT Michelle Bakels G2i is hiring remote: - Core Team React Engineers - Senior Growth Manager - Director of Growth Marketing - Community Manager There are a ton of great benefits to being a part of our team, but one missing from the post (prob an accident) is that ✨we get to work together✨ :D G2i: G2i is hiring Senior React/React Native Engineers for our Core Team! TLDR: 🔺4 yrs total experience (3+ React) 🔺21 days PTO (+ 14 G2i holiday days) 🔺Full-time employment 🔺Opportunities for the 32h work week 🔺100% remote Apply👇and learn more info🧵 https://www.g2i.co/careers?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social&campaign=twitter-g2i-hiring#Open-roles

entry.title: RT Builder DAO: We're very excited to welcome @paulpomerleau_ to our mission to build a better internet! Check out his intro article, give him a follo...
entry.summary: RT Builder DAO We're very excited to welcome @paulpomerleau_ to our mission to build a better internet! Check out his intro article, give him a follow or catch him in Discord this Friday for our first #FutureFriday collaboration call. Paul Pomerleau: Looking back, moving into web2 was easy compared to moving from web2 to web3. It shouldn't be & I want to help remove the friction. I'm excited to be joining @TheBuilderDAO to lead DevRel. It's time to look forward. Let's build a better internet, together. https://bit.ly/38cclOV

entry.summary: RT Chris Dro I’m excited to share what I’ve been working on last month. With @ethpass you can now create your own custom token gated event page where attendees can download their tickets as Apple Wallet or Google Pay passes. Fully powered by @signinwitheth & incl. automated @poapxyz claims. ethpass.xyz: We're excited to release a no-code solution to: - Offer exclusive event access for your token holders - Use Apple Wallet or Google Pay passes for your tickets - Scan tickets using your phone camera or the MetaMask app @MetaMask - Automate POAP Claims @poapxyz 🧵
